message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust in the next round if you're not happy.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it or let's see how much the money shrinks!
Okay, Bob, let's compromise. 60/40 split.  This is a fair deal, and we can stop this inflation before it gets worse.
